Name: Skeletons
About the game: Skeletons is a first person exploration indie game with melee combat, the game contains 3 levels, each level is made up of several separate locations which vary each time you play. Skeletons is a challenging game, you must discover on your own how to proceed through each level, you only have one life and time is semi-limited.
